title: Block of ice

==Useful Info==
'''Blocks of ice''' are harmless, fragile statues. You can use [[Sculpt Simulacrum]] to create blocks of ice, which will turn into [[simulacra]] after a few turns. They are also left behind when enemies are slain by [[Glaciate]] (these don't turn into simulacra).

==Tips & Tricks==
*Much like [[pillars of salt]], these will melt away on their own after a few turns. Don't bother smashing them unless you need to get through.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.31]], players did not have [[Sculpt Simulacrum]], so blocks of ice were always useless.
*Prior to [[0.27]], players could create them with [[Absolute Zero]] (and Glaciate, prior to its removal from players).
*Prior to [[0.17]], blocks of ice were not susceptible to [[Lee's Rapid Deconstruction]] and [[Shatter]].
*Blocks of ice were added in [[0.14]].
